TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StrokeCollectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

span.span: Converts a to a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 변환는 나타내는 문자열에는 base 64에서 인코딩 잉크 직렬화 형식 (ISF).The converts a to a string that represents the in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF). 도움이 될 수와 같은 웹 페이지에 원시 바이트 데이터를 저장할 수 없을 때 인코딩된 ISF e-64로 잉크 데이터를 저장할 수 있습니다.It is useful to store ink data as base-64, encoded ISF when it is not possible to store raw byte data, such as in Web pages. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 base 64로 인코딩된 ISF 문자열을 변환 하는 합니다.The following example demonstrates how to convert a base-64, encoded ISF string to a . 이 가정는 호출 `presenter`합니다.This assumes that there is an called `presenter`. [!code-csharp[InkEraser#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/CSharp/InkEraser.cs#8)] [!code-vb[InkEraser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/VisualBasic/InkEraser.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[InkEraser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/CSharp/InkEraser.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InkEraser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/VisualBasic/InkEraser.vb#3)]
